name: market for power sawing, with catalytic converter | power sawing, with catalytic converter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6211/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'power sawing, with catalytic converter', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of power sawing with catalytic converter. The service is performed with an average chainsaw that weights about 7 kg, 5.4 kg of unalloyed steel and 1.6 kg of the chain and the running rail (blade), while its lifetime capacity is 2,500 hours. The process includes infrastructure, fuel use, lubricating oil requirements, and air emissions from combustion of the fuel. The input of wood is excluded and should be added manually.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood
